parameters.sqlQuery:
-- Set the months you want to compare (YYYY-MM)
DECLARE prev_month STRING DEFAULT "2025-05";
DECLARE cur_month  STRING DEFAULT "2025-06";

WITH src AS (
  SELECT
    FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', DATE(date)) AS ym,
    spend,
    conversions
  FROM `micro-environs-470317-s2.ads_spend`.`ads_spend-20250828`
  WHERE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', DATE(date)) IN (prev_month, cur_month)
),
agg AS (
  SELECT
    ym,
    SUM(spend) AS spend,
    SUM(conversions) AS conv,
    SUM(conversions) * 100.0 AS revenue
  FROM src
  GROUP BY ym
),
cur AS (  -- current month
  SELECT spend, conv, revenue FROM agg WHERE ym = cur_month
),
prev AS ( -- previous month
  SELECT spend, conv, revenue FROM agg WHERE ym = prev_month
),
metrics AS (
  SELECT 'CAC' AS metric,
         SAFE_DIVIDE(cur.spend, NULLIF(cur.conv,0))   AS cur_v,
         SAFE_DIVIDE(prev.spend, NULLIF(prev.conv,0)) AS prev_v
  FROM cur, prev
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'ROAS' AS metric,
         SAFE_DIVIDE(cur.revenue, NULLIF(cur.spend,0)),
         SAFE_DIVIDE(prev.revenue, NULLIF(prev.spend,0))
  FROM cur, prev
)
SELECT
  metric,
  cur_month  AS current_period,
  prev_month AS previous_period,
  cur_v      AS current_value,
  prev_v     AS previous_value,
  (cur_v - prev_v) AS delta_abs,
  SAFE_DIVIDE(cur_v - prev_v, NULLIF(prev_v,0)) AS delta_pct
FROM metrics
ORDER BY
  CASE metric
    WHEN 'CAC' THEN 1
    WHEN 'ROAS' THEN 2
  END;
